first.name: Voice
first.text: Okay, so our first enemy is...

first.name: Voice
first.text: This is our first enemy yet, airhead. We might not even win against it

first.name: Bob
first.text: Come on, I thought it's gonna be some kind of monsters or some guy

first.name: Voice
first.text: Just...win this one first, shall we?

next.name: Voice
next.text: Really? You just lost to a chicken?

next.name: Bob
next.text: Shut up, I'll defeat it this time
